#summary flashDelete(key)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ControllerRequestFunctions Controller Request Functions]

*Description*:

Deletes a specific key from the Flash.

*Return Type*:

Boolean

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *key* || string || true || - || The key to delete ||

*Examples*:

}}}
